document.full_text: sony playstation gamers expressed shock and disappointment on wednesday at a massive data hack in which their names, addresses and credit-card details might have been stolen from the playstation network.
document.title: we should have been safe with sony, say gamers
lines_and_colors: sony playstation gamers expressed shock and disappointment on wednesday at a massive data hack in which their names, addresses and credit-card details might have been stolen from the playstation network.
